text:
Remember our FIFA nights
never thought we would not play again
#valverdeout
#bartomeuout

Hope to meet again when you are statistician at barcelona
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
Dhamaka Boi

although you regret now putting that name to your bayern jersey.
you are one of my most connected friend, thanks to messenger and Muller
i will never forget you for saving that goal (when keeper took strikers shot, good save btw)

all the best for your future journey
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
Pura 1st year likhu kya.

Remember when we used to do night out for TA(taua) or escaping from HEC for galaxy. Many GPLs. And many photograph which were begged to not be posted on birthdays. Well your half brother hopes to meet again.
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
We hated Liverpool together. 
you as man u fan, me as madrid fan
never seen undying support for ole from other than you
hope we meet again

all the best for your remaining journey
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
Bro you've been very helpful.
in Both guidance and studying.

All the best Mr. Tokyo

I've learned to not judge someone before meeting him from you
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
Bhai hai tu mera
first year main bhot masti ki 
tera birthday toh HEC ne epic kiya hi tha. 
aur neend ki vajah se baap treat kon miss karta hai

enjoy your remaining journey
author: Brijesh  Kaler

text:
Sir Ji!

campus main aane se pehle hi dost the. thanks to knowledge campus and Gakhal sir.
saath hi jalandhar travel kiya hai, and always same topic in journey: Football
aage bhi milte rahenge

All the best for your remaining journey
author: Brijesh  Kaler
